This program is a behind-the-scenes look at the production process of various artists belonging to the Upfront Group.
We will show you our recording, rehearsal and other production process.
Now, let's start with a behind-the-scenes look at the two MCs. I, Yamazaki, recently performed at the Thailand Japan Iconic Music Festival 2023.
Yes, you went to Thailand with Beyonce, didn't you? Yes, we did.
It was the first time for all of Beyonce to perform abroad, so I was really looking forward to it.
And we had a lot of people who always support us come to Thailand with us,
I think there were also many Thai people who saw us for the first time.
I am sure there are many Thai people who saw us for the first time, but they danced with us, called our names, and cheered and had fun together,
They were cheering and having fun together with us,
It made me very happy.
It was a lot of fun.
Everyone in Thailand looked at me with so many expressions on their faces,
It made me happy too,
I think I was able to put on a really nice smile.
I smiled a lot.
What do you think?
I, Kino, love Thai language so much that I studied it this time.
It was wonderful!
This was the third time in my life that I went to Thailand.
I have friends in Thailand and I really love the country,

I realized it?
Now that I'm aware of it, I thought it would be nice to make my stay a little more convenient,
I studied for just a little bit, just 3 weeks really,
Thank you! Thank you!
When I was in Thailand for an interview or appeared on a TV program,
I was asked to speak in Thai, and I responded in Thai,
I also taught Thai to Beyonce members,
I taught the Beyonce members Thai, and we all said "Naramaika" together, which means "Is it cute in Thai? I asked them if they were cute in Thai,
It was a great memory for me,
It was a great memory for me, and I want to study more and become more fluent in Thai so that I can be more useful.
I really feel that Momohime-chan, Kiyo, was a great help to me this time,
I really appreciate your help.
I really feel like thank you.

It's time to say goodbye to Yuhane Yamazaki and Momohime Kiyama.
I, Momohime Kiyama, was surprised to see how differently each group handles recording and what they say about it.
I was surprised to see how different the recording methods and the things they say are in different groups.
I thought that I really respected him a lot, because I don't receive such a high level of attention from him.
I, Yamazaki, saw Reina Ise's recording and was reminded of the importance of rhythm in Hello Project's songs.
I'd like to be more conscious of the importance of rhythm in Hello Project songs and Beyoncé's songs as well.
I also feel this when I cover Hello Project songs, so I want to continue to be conscious of it.
UpCami takes you behind the scenes of the production of various artists belonging to the UpFront Group.
